short_summary: Bidders must prepare, install, remove, and maintain a stock of light strings annually across Ottawa and Gatineau along Confederation Boulevard for Canadian Winter Light Program (WLAC).
description: The Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) is seeking a service provider to prepare, install, remove and maintain a stock of Light Strings on an annual basis at various sites in Ottawa and Gatineau along Confederation Boulevard. The Offeror will be required to prepare all the light strings, bulbs and support equipment, perform the installation, maintain the lighting while installed, remove the lighting and store it for the duration of the Standing Offer. The PCH will supply all light bulbs and strings.",
full_summary:
___
**Light Strings for the Winter Lights Across Canada Program**
==============================================

### Description

The Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) issues a Request for Standing Offer (RF-SO) for the preparation, installation, removal, and maintenance of a stock of light strings on an annual basis at various sites in Ottawa and Gatineau along Confederation Boulevard for a duration of three years, with two additional option periods of one year each.

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-191-1399406
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Solicitation Number**: 10231266
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-08T14:00:00

### Standing Offer Requirements

*   Award of the Standing Offer is expected to cover a period of three years, from the date of Standing Offer award, with two additional option periods of one year each.
*   The Offeror shall be required to prepare all light strings, bulbs, and support equipment, perform the installation, maintain the lighting while installed, remove the lighting, and store it for the duration of the Standing Offer.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is open to bidders from Canada and countries that are signatories to trade agreements with Canada, which include Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

### Regions of Opportunity

*   The Standing Offer shall be available to and applicable in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Tender Status

*   The tender status for this solicitation is expired.

### Requirements for Bidders

*   At the time of solicitation closing, the Offeror must have all required permits to work in the provinces of Ontario and Quebec.

### Contact Information

*   Interested bidders should communicate with the Contracting Authority, Nicole Sabourin through the following contact details.

|   Language  |   Telephone, Email, and Address   |
|-------------|----------------------------------|
|   English   |   (819) 271-7204, \ mailto:contr
